name: Minimal Clean
description: Minimal styling with system fonts. Fast, lightweight, and focused on content. Perfect for documentation, blogs, and content-heavy applications.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Less is more. Remove unnecessary decoration to focus on content and functionality. Use whitespace generously for visual breathing room.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Primarily grayscale with minimal accent color usage. High contrast black text on white backgrounds. Accent color only for critical interactive elements.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Keep components simple and functional. Avoid decorative borders and shadows. Use subtle hover states. Prioritize content hierarchy.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: High contrast by design. System fonts ensure optimal rendering across platforms. Focus states should be clear but not decorative.
